roleset.name: change, modify
roleset.note: OVERHAUL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overhaul' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with modify. (from overhaul.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: That, he said, is why Unisys is overhauling its whole business: It needs to prepare for a world in which profit margins will be lower than computer companies have been used to.
